commands.name: search-easings
commands.title: Search Spring Easings
commands.description: Browse and copy spring easing configurations for Motion.

commands.name: add-custom-easing
commands.title: Add Custom Easing
commands.description: Create your own custom spring easing with specific mass, stiffness, and damping values.

preferences.name: easing-format
preferences.title: Copy Easing Format
preferences.description: The format to copy the easing in.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
